filing_methods.description: Submit your application and upload documents online

filing_methods.address: Coleman A. Young Municipal Center, 2 Woodward Ave, Suite 130, Detroit, MI 48226
filing_methods.description: Bring your completed application and documents to the Taxpayer Service Center

always: Completed Application for Poverty Exemption (Michigan Treasury Form 5737)
Proof of ownership (deed, land contract, or court order)
Photo ID for all adults in household
if_files_taxes: Most recent federal tax return (Form 1040) for all household members who file
Most recent state tax return (MI-1040) for all household members who file
W-2s and/or 1099s for the most recent tax year
if_non_filer: Non-filer affidavit (provided by the city or available at E-HOPE)
Proof of all household income: SSA benefit letters, pension statements, employer pay stubs, unemployment letters, child support documentation
Bank statements for the last 3 months for all household accounts
if_senior_non_filer: Social Security Administration benefit letter (SSA-1099 or annual statement)
if_land_contract: Copy of the land contract agreement
Proof of current land contract payments
if_income_dropped: Documentation showing prior year income (tax return, W-2, or pay stubs)
Documentation showing current year income reduction (termination letter, reduced hours notice, medical documentation)
asset_documentation: Bank statements for all accounts (checking, savings, CDs) for the last 3 months
Investment account statements (stocks, bonds, retirement accounts other than primary)
Vehicle titles (primary vehicle is excluded from asset calculation)
